title: De mirabilibus pecci being the wonders of the peak in Darby-shire, commonly called the Devil's Arse of Peak : in English and Latine / the Latine written by Thomas Hobbes of Malmsbury ; the English by a person of quality.
author: Hobbes, Thomas, 1588-1679.
notes: English and Latin on opposite pages.
